Sentencas: The sluggish oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) is a central issue for energy conversion technologies, particularly in the cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Kinetic Atomic-Scale Reproducibility of the Oxygen Reduction Reaction Process and a Newly Suggested Strong Correlation Descriptor: A Case Study of BaCo0.75Fe0.25O3-δ

Sentencas: The recognition of atomic-level kinetics of the ORR is the key solution.
Titulo: Kinetic Atomic-Scale Reproducibility of the Oxygen Reduction Reaction Process and a Newly Suggested Strong Correlation Descriptor: A Case Study of BaCo0.75Fe0.25O3-δ

Sentencas: (BCF) perovskite cathode as a model to investigate the ambiguous ORR mechanism by density function theory and ab initio molecular dynamics.
Titulo: Kinetic Atomic-Scale Reproducibility of the Oxygen Reduction Reaction Process and a Newly Suggested Strong Correlation Descriptor: A Case Study of BaCo0.75Fe0.25O3-δ

Sentencas: The oxygen dissociation process was found as the rate-determining step, and the performance of BCF series perovskite could be well-characterized by the dissociation barrier energy.
Titulo: Kinetic Atomic-Scale Reproducibility of the Oxygen Reduction Reaction Process and a Newly Suggested Strong Correlation Descriptor: A Case Study of BaCo0.75Fe0.25O3-δ

Sentencas: Further electronic structure analysis demonstrated that the Pr (Nd)-O-dis bond accepted electrons during the oxygen dissociation process, resulting in reduction of the barrier energy.
Titulo: Kinetic Atomic-Scale Reproducibility of the Oxygen Reduction Reaction Process and a Newly Suggested Strong Correlation Descriptor: A Case Study of BaCo0.75Fe0.25O3-δ

Sentencas: Finally, strong correlations between rare earth 4f electrons and B-site transition metal 3d electrons were found to be another underlying descriptor to determine the electrochemical activity.
Titulo: Kinetic Atomic-Scale Reproducibility of the Oxygen Reduction Reaction Process and a Newly Suggested Strong Correlation Descriptor: A Case Study of BaCo0.75Fe0.25O3-δ

Sentencas: We expected that the method could be universally applied to design or screen other high-performance perovskite cathodes.
Titulo: Kinetic Atomic-Scale Reproducibility of the Oxygen Reduction Reaction Process and a Newly Suggested Strong Correlation Descriptor: A Case Study of BaCo0.75Fe0.25O3-δ
